content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help with the music recommendations.

Please go ahead and try troubleshooting the Netflix issue on a different device connected to the same Wi-Fi network. This will help us determine if the issue is specific to your laptop or if it's a problem with your Wi-Fi connection.

Take your time, and don't hesitate to reach out when you're ready to share the results. I'll be here to help you further troubleshoot or resolve the issue.

In the meantime, enjoy exploring the music I recommended! I hope you discover some new favorite artists and songs.

Feel free to reach out if you need any more music recommendations or have any other questions. I'm always here to help.

Good luck with the troubleshooting, and I look forward to hearing back from you soon!
